about.title: About Karina
about.description: Embarking on my professional journey in 2016, I entered the remote work arena with no prior experience. With a steadfast belief in the power of aspiration, I quickly rose through the ranks, beginning as an ESL teacher. In just two years, I earned a promotion to the role of Recruitment Specialist, expanding my responsibilities to include sourcing and marketing.

education.title: Bachelor of Elementary Education
education.school: UMTC University of Mindanao Tagum City

education.title: Visayan Village Central Elementary School & Magugpo Pilot Central Elementary School
